name: Dungeon Chest
description:
Dungeon Chest is an old-school puzzle game. You play as a young man who has recently learned the exciting legend of the Treasure of Akzbezth. Eager to obtain the many riches undoubtedly stored within, he travels to South America to enter an ancient Incan dungeon where the treasure is said to be hidden. However, he may soon find that it will not be as easy as he thought.

Features:

  • Increasing difficulty as you explore deeper into the dungeon.
  • Fun puzzles.
  • Over 100 rooms.
  • Ancient enemies.
